widget.name: Closed By Autobot
widget.query: status:Closed and investigation.users:""

widget.name: Acknowledgment SLA Violated By Severity
widget.query: (type:"Malware Investigation" or type:"QRadar offences onboarding" or type:Reports/UEBA or type:"GRA Alert" or type:"Phishing Investigation" or type:"Skyhigh Security Alert_SOC team" or type:"Google Workspace Incident" or type:"CrowdStrike Falcon IDP Detection" or type:Recorded_Future_Alert or type:"Recorded Future Domain Abuse" or type:"Recorded Future Threat Intel" or type:Cortex_XDR_Incident or type:"CSP Alerts" or type:"Prisma Cloud"  or type:"Web Crawling Report") and responsesla.slaStatus:late occurred:>="2022-04-28T12:00:00 +0530"

widget.description: Displays a table of the Active Incidents where the current user is not the owner, but is an investigation Team Member
widget.name: Incidents
widget.query: type:"Malware Investigation" or type:"QRadar offences onboarding" or type:"GRA Alert"

widget.description: The mean time (average time) to resond across all incidents where the response sla timer completed. The widget takes into account incidents from the last 30 days by default.
widget.name: Mean Time To Acknowledge
widget.query: (type:"Malware Investigation" or type:"QRadar offences onboarding" or type:Reports/UEBA or type:"GRA Alert" or type:"Phishing Investigation" or type:"Skyhigh Security Alert_SOC team" or type:"Google Workspace Incident" or type:"CrowdStrike Falcon IDP Detection" or type:Recorded_Future_Alert or type:"Recorded Future Domain Abuse" or type:"Recorded Future Threat Intel" or type:Cortex_XDR_Incident or type:"CSP Alerts" or type:"Prisma Cloud"  or type:"Web Crawling Report") and responsesla.runStatus:ended

widget.name: Investigation Conclusion
widget.query: -category:job -owner:"" and -type:"Shift Handling" and status:Closed and -investigationconclusion:"" and (type:"Malware Investigation" or type:"QRadar offences onboarding" or type:Reports/UEBA or type:"GRA Alert" or type:"Phishing Investigation" or type:"Skyhigh Security Alert_SOC team" or type:"Google Workspace Incident" or type:"CrowdStrike Falcon IDP Detection" or type:Recorded_Future_Alert or type:"Recorded Future Domain Abuse" or type:"Recorded Future Threat Intel" or type:Cortex_XDR_Incident or type:"CSP Alerts" or type:"Prisma Cloud"  or type:"Web Crawling Report")

widget.description: The mean time (average time) to resond across all incidents where the response sla timer completed. The widget takes into account incidents from the last 30 days by default.
widget.name: Mean Time To Resolution / Closure
widget.query: (type:"Malware Investigation" or type:"QRadar offences onboarding" or type:Reports/UEBA or type:"GRA Alert" or type:"Phishing Investigation" or type:"Skyhigh Security Alert_SOC team" or type:"Google Workspace Incident" or type:"CrowdStrike Falcon IDP Detection" or type:Recorded_Future_Alert or type:"Recorded Future Domain Abuse" or type:"Recorded Future Threat Intel" or type:Cortex_XDR_Incident or type:"CSP Alerts" or type:"Prisma Cloud"  or type:"Web Crawling Report") and (closuresla.runStatus:ended)

widget.name: Security Alerts Investigated Per Month
widget.query: (sourceInstance:QRadar_instance_1 or sourceInstance:"QRadar v3_Offence Fetch" or sourceInstance:CrowdstrikeFalcon_Detections or type:Reports/UEBA or type:"GRA Alert") and -closeReason:Duplicate and -type:Unclassified and -type:"Contain Host : Threat:(FI&FO)" and occurred:>="2000-06-30T00:00:00 +0530"
